title: 01/25/22 DPS Hour 3 Ryan Clark
itunes:title: 01/25/22 DPS Hour 3 Ryan Clark
description:
Ryan Clark talks to Dan about the overtime rule in the NFL. Ryan says he has a solution but he is not sure that it will ever be fair.
